pre: I can sense great power in my dreams. I know there is important information hidden here. I should continue searching until I find it.
researched: I have seen things, things that were not meant for the eyes of men. These things make my vision fog and my mind cloud. I don't want to see them. I don't want to see them. Shut up! Shut up! Leave me alone! MEANS: A moment before the dawn now and not there was a strife amongst the barely a linear curve teem
